member.name: MIB_PROXYARP
member.summary: TheMIB_PROXYARP structure stores information for a Proxy Address Resolution Protocol (PARP) entry.

member.name: MIB_PROXYARP.dwAddress
member.summary: The IPv4 address for which to act as a proxy.

member.name: MIB_PROXYARP.dwMask
member.summary: The subnet mask for the IPv4 address specified by the dwAddress member.

member.name: MIB_PROXYARP.dwIfIndex
member.summary: The index of the interface on which to act as a proxy for the address specified by the dwAddress member.
